website_summaries.verdict: Though it lacks some of the features of similar Michael Kors wallets, it's still worth considering if you want a basic, streamlined design.
pros: The gorgeous leather construction, large MK hardware, and numerous color choices make it a nice option for those who prefer classic looks
cons: Has fewer interior pockets than others in its class, and won't fit most cell phones
Interior lining is prone to rips

customer_reviews.title: it looked like all the shine was took off & turned a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The wallet came & it wasnt gold on the MK sign, it looked like all the shine was took off & turned a funny silver color. Also underneath the MK symbol was rusty. Very upset after spending all this money & getting a wallet like this.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Albury

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful exactly what I wanted matches my purse perfectly, and 100% authentic. ❤️❤️❤️ Will definitely be ordering a few more items from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: MrsTurner

customer_reviews.title: MARVELOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on 7/6 & received this on 7/12...It is beautiful!!! I couldn't be happier!!! I generally order my MK Bags from Macy's & get the matching wallets from Amazon with no problems of authenticity, this wallet included!!! That being said, I ordered the black with the gold hardware & it was in pristine condition! I believe it to be the real deal...can't understand any of the negative reviews on this wallet, nor do I believe them! I will be ordering again I am sure from this seller in the future...I highly recommend this seller! I am very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: treele

customer_reviews.title: Saved Some Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a genuine Michael Kors wallet. It was at least $40 less than department store prices when I compared current pricing and I purchased to match a current MK purse. The material is very soft and the metal is shined, but I did spray down with some MK sealer to ensure that the shine would not be lost over use. Very happy with this purchase, and would recommend to anyone looking to save a bit on their MK addiction like me.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: I Heart MK
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my Michael Kors Pearl Grey Leather Wallet. The leather is so soft and the color is an exact match to what you see. I purchased this wallet to go with my light grey MK signature bag and it was a perfect match. MK never disappoints - never. I love it! It arrived fast, it was well packaged, it is exactly as described in the description. The price was great and my transaction with this seller/Amazon was 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: LHaynes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made! The quality is obvious. I'm pleased as this is my first foray into Michael Kors. I'm excited for my bag to arrive that I found that matches it exactly (purchased from another vendor). Only disappointment is that it doesn't have a magnetic closure but it wasn't advertised to have one. All in all, beautiful, roomy and I'm well-pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Evangls

customer_reviews.title: Michael Kors Fulton Flap Black wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! Very well made & plenty of room for everything. It holds my check book, cards, change, & receipts with no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Monica F.

customer_reviews.title: More Beautiful Than the Picture
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is absolutely beautiful! It is more beautiful than the picture and it matches the purse I found at Macy's perfectly! I do not like the folded wallets and I always look for a nice size wallet that will hold my credit cards and give me a place to squirrel away money for unexpected happenings. This wallet definitely arise to the occasion. I usually purchase Coach brand products, because I find Michael Kors handbags to be a bit on the heavy side. This wallet is the same size as my zip around coach wallet. I absolutely love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: From my mom: "I love my new Michael Kors wallet, it is absolutely beautiful! After reading some of the reviews I was skeptical, but upon opening it, it exceeded my expectations! The size is perfect and it will hold all my credit cards, drivers license, checkbook and cash! The leather is so soft, everything about it is perfect!"
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Readme. Fake. Head the warning.
customer_reviews.text: FAKE. I spent several hours looking at a set of real purses directly from Michael Kors as well as extensive reeaserch and countless forum's. I found several red flags including a snap button from a diffrent manufacturer and a fake tag that when compared to a item directly from MK and online evidence was a smoking gun. This seller states theese items are genuine but don't waste your time. MK.com sometimes has good deals and you may spend more but you get REAL merchandise. If I could give less than 1 star I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous wallet! The gold hardware compliments the beautiful black leather so well. It is a pretty big wallet with lots of space to fit all your needs. I purchased this for my mother for her upcoming birthday. She will be so happy to receive this beautiful wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: She nearly knocked my head off!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best present that I've gotten for my mom for Christmas !

customer_reviews.title: She loves it, ur lady will too, : )

customer_reviews.title: Quality is everything!

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT real leather nor is it a real ...

product_meta.title: MICHAEL Michael Kors Fulton Carryall
product_meta.description:
* Finish your look with the fabulously fashionable Fulton small flap.
 * Softly pebbled leather clutch-style wallet. 
 * Holds your credit cards, currency, coins and your favorite lipstick.
 * Signature logo hardware.
 * Top flap with a snap closure.
 * Interior lining with a currency compartment, credit card slots and a center zip divider.
 * Imported.
feature_bullets: Soft Venus Leather with Gold-Tone Hardware
Exterior Slit Pocket, Interior Zip Divider, Two Interior Bill Pockets, Fourteen Interior Card Slots
